titleStmt.title: Officium quotidianum: or, A manual of private devotions By the most reverend father in God Dr. William Laud late Lord Arch-bishop of Canterbury.
titleStmt.author: Laud, William, 1573-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Robert Crofts at the Crown in Chancery-lane,

notesStmt.note: Copy imperfect; tightly bound with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
